verses.verse: Gather<WH7197> yourselves together, yes, gather<WH7197> together, O nation<WH1471> not desired;<WH3700>

Before<WH2962> the decree<WH2706> bring<WH3205> forth,<WH3205> before the day<WH3117> pass<WH5674> as the chaff,<WH4671> before<WH2962> <WH3808> the fierce<WH2740> anger<WH639> of the LORD<WH3068> come<WH935> on you, before<WH2962> <WH3808> the day<WH3117> of the LORD's<WH3068> anger<WH639> come<WH935> on you.

Seek<WH1245> you the LORD,<WH3068> all<WH3605> you meek<WH6035> of the earth,<WH776> which<WH834> have worked<WH6466> his judgment;<WH4941> seek<WH1245> righteousness,<WH6664> seek<WH1245> meekness:<WH6038> it may<WH194> be you shall be hid<WH5641> in the day<WH3117> of the LORD's<WH3068> anger.<WH639>
For Gaza<WH5804> shall be forsaken,<WH5800> and Ashkelon<WH831> a desolation:<WH8077> they shall drive<WH1644> out Ashdod<WH795> at the noon<WH6672> day, and Ekron<WH6138> shall be rooted<WH6131> up.

Woe<WH1945> to the inhabitants<WH3427> of the sea<WH3220> coast,<WH2256> the nation<WH1471> of the Cherethites!<WH3774> the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> is against<WH5921> you; O Canaan,<WH3667> the land<WH776> of the Philistines,<WH6430> I will even destroy<WH6> you, that there shall be no<WH369> inhabitant.<WH3427>
And the sea<WH3220> coast<WH2256> shall be dwellings<WH5116> and cottages<WH3741> for shepherds,<WH7462> and folds<WH1448> for flocks.<WH6629>

And the coast<WH2256> shall be for the remnant<WH7611> of the house<WH1004> of Judah;<WH3063> they shall feed<WH7462> thereupon: in the houses<WH1004> of Ashkelon<WH831> shall they lie<WH7257> down<WH7257> in the evening:<WH6153> for the LORD<WH3068> their God<WH430> shall visit<WH6485> them, and turn<WH7725> away their captivity.<WH7622>

I have heard<WH8085> the reproach<WH2781> of Moab,<WH4124> and the revilings<WH1421> of the children<WH1121> of Ammon,<WH5983> whereby<WH834> they have reproached<WH2778> my people,<WH5971> and magnified<WH1431> themselves against<WH5921> their border.<WH1366>

Therefore<WH3651> as I live,<WH2416> said<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> Surely<WH3588> Moab<WH4124> shall be as Sodom,<WH5467> and the children<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983> as Gomorrah,<WH6017> even the breeding<WH4476> of nettles,<WH2738> and salt pits,<WH4417> and a perpetual<WH5769> desolation:<WH8077> the residue<WH7611> of my people<WH5971> shall spoil<WH962> them, and the remnant<WH3499> of my people<WH1471> shall possess<WH5157> them.

This<WH2063> shall they have for their pride,<WH1347> because<WH3588> they have reproached<WH2778> and magnified<WH1431> themselves against<WH5921> the people<WH5971> of the LORD<WH3068> of hosts.<WH6635>

The LORD<WH3068> will be terrible<WH3372> to them: for he will famish<WH7329> all<WH3605> the gods<WH430> of the earth;<WH776> and men shall worship<WH7812> him, every<WH376> one<WH376> from his place,<WH4725> even all<WH3605> the isles<WH339> of the heathen.<WH1471>
You Ethiopians<WH3569> also,<WH1571> you shall be slain<WH2491> by my sword.<WH2719>

And he will stretch<WH5186> out his hand<WH3027> against<WH5921> the north,<WH6828> and destroy<WH6> Assyria;<WH804> and will make<WH7760> Nineveh<WH5210> a desolation,<WH8077> and dry<WH6723> like a wilderness.<WH4057>

And flocks<WH5739> shall lie<WH7257> down<WH7257> in the middle<WH8432> of her, all<WH3605> the beasts<WH2416> of the nations:<WH1471> both<WH1571> the cormorant<WH6893> and the bittern<WH7090> shall lodge<WH3885> in the upper<WH3730> lintels<WH3730> of it; their voice<WH6963> shall sing<WH7891> in the windows;<WH2474> desolation<WH2721> shall be in the thresholds;<WH5592> for he shall uncover<WH6168> the cedar<WH731> work.<WH731>

This<WH2063> is the rejoicing<WH5947> city<WH5892> that dwelled<WH3427> carelessly,<WH983> that said<WH559> in her heart,<WH3824> I am, and there is none<WH657> beside<WH657> me: how<WH349> is she become<WH1961> a desolation,<WH8047> a place for beasts<WH2416> to lie<WH4769> down<WH4769> in! every<WH3605> one that passes<WH5674> by her shall hiss,<WH8319> and wag<WH5128> his hand.<WH3027>
